body_html:
Not clear yet. I still need to reproduce this on the CI. It looks like sumall didn't get compiled for AVX2, which is surprising because afaict the cmake file doesn't care what kind of capability the CPU has this is being compiled on.

(base) C:\Jenkins\workspace\pytorch-builds\pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test\test>python run_test.py --verbose   && python ..\ci_scripts\delete_image.py 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_autograd.py", line 2633, in <module>
    ('masked_select', (M, M), (mask_not_all_zeros((M, M)),)),
  File "test_autograd.py", line 2082, in mask_not_all_zeros
    if result.sum() > 0:
RuntimeError: Function not yet implemented for AVX2

body:
Not clear yet. I still need to reproduce this on the CI. It looks like sumall didn't get compiled for AVX2, which is surprising because afaict the cmake file doesn't care what kind of capability the CPU has this is being compiled on.

```
(base) C:\Jenkins\workspace\pytorch-builds\pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test\test>python run_test.py --verbose   && python ..\ci_scripts\delete_image.py 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_autograd.py", line 2633, in <module>
    ('masked_select', (M, M), (mask_not_all_zeros((M, M)),)),
  File "test_autograd.py", line 2082, in mask_not_all_zeros
    if result.sum() > 0:
RuntimeError: Function not yet implemented for AVX2
```
